sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Process upload
sect1.para: This page uploads a BPEL process.

sect3.title: Process name
sect3.para: When specified, this string will be the name of the process.

sect3.title: Deployment Methods
sect3.para:
Choose values from the list in order to import process or upload BPEL and WSDL files for process.
If you choose "Import process" value from the Deployment Methods list, all bpel and wsdl files referenced by the file at this URL will be loaded and will be ready to compile.
If you choose "Upload process" value from the Deployment Methods list, will be allowed to individually upload or provide external URI's for the bpel and wsdl files defining the process. When these are all provided the process will be ready to be compiled.

sect3.title: BPEL
sect3.para: This is the section for uploading the bpel file for the process.

simplelist.member: To choose the "URL" option choose the "URL" radio button.
To choose the "File" option choose the "File" radio button.

sect3.title: WSDL
sect3.para: This is the section for uploading the wsdl file for the process.

simplelist.member: To choose the "URL" option choose the "URL" radio button.
To choose the "File" option choose the "File" radio button.

sect3.title: Authentication
sect3.para: This is the authentication section. When the file responding to the file at entered "URL" file location expects authentication, you have to enter user name and paswword for the authentication.

simplelist.member: Enter the User name in the field "User".
Enter the password in the field "Password".

sect3.title: Load Deployment Descriptor from
sect3.para: This is the Deployment Descriptor section.

simplelist.member: All bpel and wsdl files referenced by the file at this URL will be loaded and will be ready to compile.
